<?php

namespace Embed\Dom;

use Embed\Exceptions\InvalidUrlException;
use Embed\Http\ClientInterface;
use Embed\Http\RequestInterface;
use Embed\Http\ResponseInterface;
use Embed\Utils\Options;
use Exception;
use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Psr7\Request;
use Psr\Http\Client\ClientExceptionInterface;
use Psr\Http\Message\UriInterface;

class Dom
{
    protected Document $document;

    /**
     * Creates a new Dom instance.
     */
    private function __construct(Document $document)
    {
        $this->document = $document;
    }

    /**
     * Creates a Dom instance from a URL.
     *
     * @throws InvalidUrlException
     */
    public static function loadFromUrl(string $url, ?Options $options = null, ?ClientInterface $client = null, ?RequestInterface $request = null): self
    {
        $options = $options ?: new Options();
        $client = $client ?: new Client();

        try {
            $uri = self::getUri($url);

            $request = $request ?: new Request('GET', $uri);
            $response = $client->sendRequest($request);

            return self::createFromResponse($response, $options);
        } catch (InvalidUrlException $e) {
            throw $e;
        } catch (ClientExceptionInterface $e) {
            throw new InvalidUrlException($e->getMessage(), $url, $e);
        }
    }

    /**
     * Creates a Dom instance from a response.
     */
    public static function createFromResponse(ResponseInterface $response, ?Options $options = null): self
    {
        $options = $options ?: new Options();

        return new self(new Document($response->getContent(), $response->getUrl(), $options));
    }

    /**
     * Creates a Dom instance from a string.
     */
    public static function createFromString(string $html, ?string $url = null, ?Options $options = null): self
    {
        $options = $options ?: new Options();

        return new self(new Document($html, $url, $options));
    }

    /**
     * Creates a Dom instance from a file.
     */
    public static function createFromFile(string $file, ?Options $options = null): self
    {
        $options = $options ?: new Options();

        return new self(new Document(file_get_contents($file), "file://{$file}", $options));
    }

    /**
     * Returns the DOMDocument.
     */
    public function getDocument(): Document
    {
        return $this->document;
    }

    /**
     * Get an UriInterface instance.
     *
     * @throws InvalidUrlException
     */
    private static function getUri(string $url): UriInterface
    {
        try {
            $uri = new \GuzzleHttp\Psr7\Uri($url);

            if ('' === $uri->getHost()) {
                throw new InvalidUrlException("Invalid URL: {$url}");
            }

            return $uri;
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            throw new InvalidUrlException($e->getMessage(), $url, $e);
        }
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class for handling HTTP requests using cURL with support for various HTTP methods, streaming, authentication, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: BCS_RequestCore is a comprehensive HTTP client class that provides a flexible interface for making HTTP requests using PHP's cURL extension. It supports all major HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD), handles authentication, proxy configuration, streaming uploads/downloads, and provides detailed response information.

Attributes:

request_url: [string] - The URL to send the request to
request_headers: [array] - Associative array of request headers
request_body: [string] - The request body content
response: [string] - The complete response from the server
response_headers: [array] - Parsed response headers
response_body: [string] - The response body content
response_code: [int] - HTTP response status code
response_info: [array] - Additional response information from cURL
curl_handle: [resource] - The cURL handle resource
method: [string] - HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD)
proxy: [array|null] - Proxy configuration details
username: [string|null] - Username for authentication
password: [string|null] - Password for authentication
curlopts: [array|null] - Additional cURL options
debug_mode: [bool] - Whether to enable debug mode
request_class: [string] - Class name for request handling
response_class: [string] - Class name for response handling
useragent: [string] - User agent string
read_file: [string|null] - File path for streaming upload
read_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for reading
read_stream_size: [int|null] - Size of the read stream
read_stream_read: [int] - Bytes read from the stream
write_file: [string|null] - File path for streaming download
write_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for writing
seek_position: [int|null] - Position to seek in the read stream
registered_streaming_read_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming read
registered_streaming_write_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming write

Methods:

__construct([string|null] $url, [array|null] $proxy, [array|null] $helpers) -> [self] - Initializes the request object with optional URL, proxy, and helper classes
__destruct() -> [self] - Cleans up any open file handles
set_credentials([string] $user, [string] $pass) -> [self] - Sets authentication credentials
add_header([string] $key, [string] $value) -> [self] - Adds a request header
remove_header([string] $key) -> [self] - Removes a request header
set_method([string] $method) -> [self] - Sets the HTTP method
set_useragent([string] $ua) -> [self] - Sets the user agent string
set_body([string] $body) -> [self] - Sets the request body
set_request_url([string] $url) -> [self] - Sets the request URL
set_curlopts([array] $curlopts) -> [self] - Sets additional cURL options
set_read_stream_size([int] $size) -> [self] - Sets the read stream size
set_read_stream([resource] $resource, [int|null] $size) -> [self] - Sets the read stream resource
set_read_file([string] $location) -> [self] - Sets a file to read from
set_write_stream([resource] $resource) -> [self] - Sets the write stream resource
set_write_file([string] $location) -> [self] - Sets a file to write to
set_proxy([string] $proxy) -> [self] - Configures proxy settings
set_seek_position([int|null] $position) -> [self] - Sets the seek position for read stream
register_streaming_read_callback([callable] $callback) -> [self] - Registers a streaming read callback
register_streaming_write_callback([callable] $callback) -> [self] - Registers a streaming write callback
streaming_read_callback([resource] $curl_handle, [resource] $file_handle, [int] $length) -> [string] - Callback for reading from stream
streaming_write_callback([resource] $curl_handle, [string] $data) -> [int] - Callback for writing to stream
prep_request() -> [resource] - Prepares and returns a cURL handle
process_response([resource|null] $curl_handle, [string|null] $response) -> [mixed] - Processes the cURL response
send_request([bool] $parse) -> [mixed] - Sends the request and returns response
isBaeEnv() -> [bool] - Checks if running in Baidu App Engine environment
get_response_header([string|null] $header) -> [mixed] - Gets response header(s)
get_response_body() -> [string] - Gets the response body
get_response_code() -> [int] - Gets the response status code

<?php
class BCS_RequestCore
{
    public $request_url;
    public $request_headers;
    public $request_body;
    public $response;
    public $response_headers;
    public $response_body;
    public $response_code;
    public $response_info;
    public $curl_handle;
    public $method;
    public $proxy = null;
    public $username = null;
    public $password = null;
    public $curlopts = null;
    public $debug_mode = false;
    public $request_class = 'BCS_RequestCore';
    public $response_class = 'BCS_ResponseCore';
    public $useragent = 'BCS_RequestCore/1.4.3';
    public $read_file = null;
    public $read_stream = null;
    public $read_stream_size = null;
    public $read_stream_read = 0;
    public $write_file = null;
    public $write_stream = null;
    public $seek_position = null;
    public $registered_streaming_read_callback = null;
    public $registered_streaming_write_callback = null;


    public function __construct($url = null, $proxy = null, $helpers = null) {
        $this->request_url = $url;
        $this->method = 'GET';
        $this->request_headers = array();
        $this->proxy = $proxy;
        if (isset($helpers['request']) && !empty($helpers['request'])) {
            $this->request_class = $helpers['request'];
        }
        if (isset($helpers['response']) && !empty($helpers['response'])) {
            $this->response_class = $helpers['response'];
        }
    }

    public function __destruct() {
        if (is_resource($this->read_stream)) {
            fclose($this->read_stream);
        }
        if (is_resource($this->write_stream)) {
            fclose($this->write_stream);
        }
    }

    public function set_credentials($user, $pass) {
        $this->username = $user;
        $this->password = $pass;
        return $this;
    }

    public function add_header($key, $value) {
        $this->request_headers[$key] = $value;
        return $this;
    }

    public function remove_header($key) {
        unset($this->request_headers[$key]);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_method($method) {
        $this->method = strtoupper($method);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_useragent($ua) {
        $this->useragent = $ua;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_body($body) {
        $this->request_body = $body;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_request_url($url) {
        $this->request_url = $url;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_curlopts($curlopts) {
        $this->curlopts = $curlopts;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream_size($size) {
        $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream($resource, $size = null) {
        $this->read_stream = $resource;
        return $this->set_read_stream_size($size);
    }

    public function set_read_file($location) {
        $this->read_file = $location;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_stream($resource) {
        $this->write_stream = $resource;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_file($location) {
        $this->write_file = $location;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_proxy($proxy) {
        $this->proxy = $proxy;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_seek_position($position) {
        $this->seek_position = $position;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_read_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_write_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_write_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }


    public function streaming_read_callback($curl_handle, $file_handle, $length) {
        if ($this->read_stream_read >= $this->read_stream_size) {
            return '';
        }
        $read = fread($this->read_stream, $length);
        $this->read_stream_read += strlen($read);
        return $read;
    }

    public function streaming_write_callback($curl_handle, $data) {
        $length = fwrite($this->write_stream, $data);
        return $length;
    }

    public function prep_request() {
        $curl_handle = curl_init();

        // Set default options.
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILETIME, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_FRESH_CONNECT, false);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CLOSEPOLICY, CURLCLOSEPOLICY_LEAST_RECENTLY_USED);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, 5);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 5184000);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, 120);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOSIGNAL, true);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_REFERER, $this->request_url);


        if ($this->debug_mode) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, true);
        }

        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy['host']);
            if (isset($this->proxy['port'])) {
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXYPORT, $this->proxy['port']);
            }
            if (isset($this->proxy['user']) && isset($this->proxy['pass'])) {
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD, $this->proxy['user'] . ':' . $this->proxy['pass']);
            }
        }

        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, $this->username . ':' . $this->password);
        }

        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $key => $value) {
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, $key, $value);
            }
        }

        switch ($this->method) {
            case 'GET':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPGET, true);
                break;
            case 'POST':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POST, true);
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
                break;
            case 'PUT':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PUT');
                if ($this->read_stream || $this->read_file) {
                    if (!isset($this->read_stream_size) || $this->read_stream_size < 0) {
                        throw new BCS_Exception('The stream size for the streaming upload cannot be determined.');
                    }
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
                    if ($this->read_stream) {
                        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback =
                            array($this, 'streaming_read_callback');
                        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, $this->registered_streaming_read_callback);
                    } else {
                        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_file);
                        $this->seek_position && curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_SEEKFUNCTION, function() {});
                    }
                } else {
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
                }
                break;
            case 'HEAD':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'HEAD');
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOBODY, 1);
                break;
            case 'DELETE':
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
                if ($this->request_body) {
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
                }
                break;
            default:
                curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $this->method);
                if ($this->request_body) {
                    curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
                }
                break;
        }


        $request_headers = array();
        foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
            $request_headers[] = $key . ': ' . $value;
        }
        curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $request_headers);

        if ($this->write_stream) {
            $this->registered_streaming_write_callback =
                array($this, 'streaming_write_callback');
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, $this->registered_streaming_write_callback);
        } else if ($this->write_file) {
            curl_setopt($curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILE, $this->write_file);
        }

        return $curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, $response = null) {
        if ($curl_handle && $response) {
            $this->curl_handle = $curl_handle;
            $this->response = $response;
        }

        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($this->curl_handle);
        $this->response_code = $this->response_info['http_code'];

        $header_size = curl_getinfo($this->curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $this->response_headers = substr($this->response, 0, $header_size);
        $this->response_body = substr($this->response, $header_size);

        curl_close($this->curl_handle);
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = false) {
        $curl_handle = $this->prep_request();
        $this->response = curl_exec($curl_handle);

        if ($this->response === false) {
            throw new BCS_Exception("cURL request failed: " . curl_error($curl_handle));
        }

        $parsed_response = $this->process_response($curl_handle, $this->response);

        return $parsed_response;
    }


    public function isBaeEnv() {
        return (getenv('HTTP_BAE_ENV_APPID') || getenv('BAE_ENV_APPID'));
    }

    public function get_response_header($header = null) {
        if ($header) {
            if (isset($this->response_headers[$header])) {
                return $this->response_headers[$header];
            }
            return null;
        }
        return $this->response_headers;
    }

    public function get_response_body() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code() {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}
?>
